dashboard.label: app_config
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":20,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"cell","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.customUrl","options":{"url":"$row.splunkbase_url|n$","newTab":true}}],"title":"Additional apps - Installed, required and recommended apps. Click on a row to open the link to the addon or use the manage apps page."}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup app_dependencies 
| rename app_name AS title
| join type=outer title
 [ | rest /services/apps/local 
 | table title
| stats count by title]
| eval is_installed = if(isnull(count),"false","true")
| table title, is_required, is_installed, splunkbase_url","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}}}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":250},"structure":[{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":[]},"description":"This dashboards displays configuration information","title":"app_config"}
